isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - CRUISE CONTROL, PTO, HAND THROTTLE SYSTEM - PTO (ENGINE SPEED) CONTROL

svcproc.title: PTO (ENGINE SPEED) CONTROL
svcproc.para: PTO speed control is to allow an operator to set a fixed engine speed, either in the cab or remotely. In cab PTO uses the same switches on the dash as are used for the cruise control. Remote PTO uses switches which are installed by a body builder and are wired into the vehicle's wiring harness at the "body builder's connections". There are two features that utilize the PTO speed controls. Remote accelerator pedal and Hydraulic Pressure Governing. Refer to RPS and HPG in this section of manual.
